item.title: IR Station
item.author: kerikun11+web@gmail.com (KERI)
item.description: IR-Station Infrared Remote Controller with ESP8266 WiFi-module You can control your home appliances with your smartphone or laptop. The latest information is here Main parts ESP-WROOM-02 (ESP8266 WiFi Module) IR Receiver IR LED Indicator LED Looks The Device’s Appearance Display Sample How to Use Setup the Device Supply power to the device. Connect your cellphone or laptop to Wi-Fi SSID “IR-Station”. Access http://192.168.4.1 in a browser Enter Wi-Fi SSID of your home and its password Enter a device name you like.
